website_summaries.verdict: Leather and vinyl cleaner, conditioner, and protectant in a on-greasy, easy-to-use, spray-on formula.
pros: Leather cleaner, conditioner, and protectant in an easy-to-use spray bottle dispenser
Helps clean stains, condition material, repel future soiling and dust, and protect from harmful UV radiation, which fades and cracks leather
Safe for any leather or vinyl surface (not for suede or unfinished leather)
cons: Some who tried this product did not achieve the results they expected on certain types of stains
A few would prefer if the formula were not dispensed in a spray bottle, due to incidences of over-spray onto other areas

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: This ruined my sofa!! Lifted the color off my $2000 sofa! I'm in tears...
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Leaks. Worst Spray Nozzle Ever
customer_reviews.text: They ship it with capped with the nozzle separated in a plastic bag for good reason. Save the cap and the plastic bag for storage as the nozzle leaks all over the place (at least mine did). Bottle has the aluminum-type tab cover that needs to be removed - no help there either as there is no notch to the removal so you have to use a knife and will never get the residual aluminum off the top to the bottle. The product itself seemed fine but using it was not a pleasant experience. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JimJam

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on my new car
customer_reviews.text: I use this to wipe down the black leather interior of my Mazda CX-5 along with a microfiber towel. I was afraid to use harsher products on my new car leather and I came across this and gave it a chance. It's great for wiping down surfaces of my dashboard, front, doors and seats. This is a gentle formula so if I have a stubborn stain/mark I do add a little more product and rub down a little harder but it does the job. I tend to have a couple of make up stains on my steering wheel in the morning and this gets that all off too no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: 303 protectant is good, but the screw cap pump is designed to ...
customer_reviews.text: 303 protectant is good, but the screw cap pump is designed to lock on and never be removed. This causes the bottle to leak when the threads get stripped while tightening. My bottle of 303 leaks everywhere when I use it, so I have to put a paper towel around the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Chambra

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I saw this on a YouTube channel called "Mercedessource". The host, Kent, made a personal recommendation about 303 products on the Mercedes interiors he touches up in his shop. I love the way it cleans/conditions the leather in my Mercedes without the oily feel and glossy shine other products leave. I'm sure there are other products like this, but so far this is the one I tried and it works very well. Before I used 303 leather on my seats and door panels, I wiped them down with a microfiber cloth soaked in lukewarm water with dish soap. I had to use soapy water to clean off the other layers of oil that previous leather products left.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher 84

customer_reviews.title: Best Leather Cleaner that Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST leather cleaner and conditioner in the market. Bought a whole bunch high end and expensive one from local retail auto supply stores, but nothing can compare to this. It is very easy to apply and does not leave a layer of sticky, oily or film residual like others. It wipes away the dirt and leaves a nice shine. Have been using on my car leather seat and sofa at home.
customer_reviews.author: PBLee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leather cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I have a 2004 BMW that i try to keep clean. I am a mechanic by trade so that can be difficult. Especially with the beige interior. I have used other name brand leather cleaners and it just seemed like so much work. I sprayed this stuff on and my greasy hand marks come right off. Super stoked i decided to get this. It still didn't get everything, but i this done a better job than everything else i have used. Seems to work good on my leather shoes too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Spear

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leather cleaner around. I've tried several different brands, and this one is amazing. We have a white leather sofa, and dogs. They get the sofa so dirty at times, but this cleaner gets the job done with very little effort by me. In fact, one of the dogs threw up on the sofa the other night, and when I found it in the morning, it was a dried, sticky mess. I sprayed this cleaner on it, and it all wiped right off like it was nothing. Amazing! My only gripe is the cost, which is a bit high, but it's still well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Avocatomama

customer_reviews.title: I was underwhelmed...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. I've used the whole bottle of 303 Leather Cleaner and Conditioner on multiple items like boots, belts, flip-flops, and the seats in my Benz. I was underwhelmed in every instance. This stuff doesn't make magic happen like their flagship product, 303 Protectant, does.
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe1971

customer_reviews.title: Works great, leather looks/feels nice!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for a few months now on leather car seats and sofas, both dark leathers. I’ve had no issues with fading or rubbing off of colors whatsoever, but I also apply lightly with a soft rag every few weeks (3-4) without undue scrubbing. I find that it cleans well, and best of all, leaves the material feeling soft, supple, and smooth. So far the conditioning agents are keeping my leather looking and feeling like new. I’ll try on shoes and bags as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fuego

customer_reviews.title: More and More falling in love with 303 products
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a change to my old favorite Maguire's wipes. Found this brand from a car forums site and have fallen for alot of their products. I cleaned my seats down with some dawn and water. Next used this product and am thoroughly satisfied. Not greasy or messy. Little spray goes a long way. I have bonded leather in a focus st and it works great. I have also included 303 tire balm and their interior protection after my drive through car wash and love them. Their products are different than I am used too and I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Slowboogie

customer_reviews.title: Matte finish, nice fragrance, all in one cleaner & protectant
customer_reviews.text: If you have heavy dirt/mud, wipe with a damp microfiber first to not waste this product. It’ll last for a long time. Pleasant fragrance without being overwhelming like conditioners, easy to use, leaves a nice matte finish compared to shiny / greasy looking with other products out there. A little goes a long way. Replaced a few products with just one. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JVStone

customer_reviews.title: Pretty satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My first bottle leaked, and dripped all over my car’s floor mat. A bit annoying but got a replacement right away, so that’s good. The formula works well, smells amazing. It’s not a heavy duty or a magic leather spray. It won’t fix your cracks but will make your leather cleaner and softer. Good for its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: stark

customer_reviews.title: Quality, value.
customer_reviews.text: 303 is a great product. Unlike other petroleum distillates, 303 preserves and keeps your leather looking like new.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Bourg

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I like most 303 products, just not this one. It has a strong odor and leaves the leather looking too shiny, more like a coating than a cleaning. I'm keeping it for secondary uses, would not repurchase as there are better products.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Like It!
customer_reviews.text: I use the product once a week on my convertible with red leather seats. The product softens the leather giving a supple feel to it. I am not sure of the UV protection but time will tell. It does help clean dirt and small marks on the leather. Great fragrance to it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love 303
customer_reviews.text: A bit more expensive than some products, but they work better and provide better UV protection. Been using 303 products for years with better results than things like Armor All. I use their products on tires, convertible top, interior and exterior with great, easy to use results.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Best auto leather cleaner on the market
customer_reviews.text: Another winner from 303!! I have tried all of the car leather cleaners with mixed results. The worst was chemical guys. Other cleaners either left a slippery sheen or had no cleaning power. 303 worked perfect. I will using this from now on. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Might as been water
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to clean no different than water and did not sppear to leave any protectant.
customer_reviews.author: ThePhoenix

customer_reviews.title: Did Nothing to Worn Leather Seats !!
customer_reviews.text: I used it to Clean but, it never restored my Leather !! I ended up Painting the Seats with Leather Spray Paint that worked a Hell of a lot Better !!
customer_reviews.author: CobraThomas

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on recommendation. Not a super cleaning product. Or my dog is just super dirty on my leather seats. Time will tell if this top rated. Not sure. No offense scent.
customer_reviews.author: ma

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product and works well on auto interior dash. Love it is mat finish and does not leave a glossy shine on the dash which prevents blinding reflections in windshield on sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: The best discovery of the year for me. I love 303 Protectant. It's easy to use, looks good, and lasts longer than anything I've used previously. As far as I can tell It's superior as a Protectant but only time will tell for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to apply and doesn’t leave an oily residue.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product better than any others I have used in the past. Dries very well and doesn’t leave any residue. Have only used it for about 8 months but I use it more often than other products because it goes on more evenly and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brett V

customer_reviews.title: Works well on leather
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to clean and maintain a cream leather sofa. It works well . I try to use the spray at least once a month, and whenever I notice a spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My go-to and now only leather cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Cleans and protects in one step without the nasty residue of other cleaner/conditioners. Use it on my bike, cars, and home furniture. Can’t recommend this stuff enough for any form of leather you wish to have cleaned and protected.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: haven't used it much but satifisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like the product although it use is somewhat limited. My truck seats stay pretty clean, but the times it has been used, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: daggert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy and really cleans. I guess it's a real trust me on the UV protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mort

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on my boat vinyl upholstery. Doesn't seem to be giving any cleaning effect. Hope that it provides at least some softening/conditioning and UV-protecting. Will look for better cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love the stuff use it all over my Ford explore leather interior keeps it nice and fresh. Also there’s no greasy residue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Devol

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for my leather interior
customer_reviews.text: What else can you say that other haven't said before... Buy this and you won't be disappointed! Cleans and protects amongst other benefits...
customer_reviews.author: Getusum1999

customer_reviews.title: Not good not bad
customer_reviews.text: I use it for the car's leather seat and dashboard. It is working properly. I can't say that it doesn't make any change, it does, however it is not as described as it is. I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Akman Family

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: As the description says it cleans and protect the leather, It didn’t happened, didn’t clean any spot, and doesn’t seems it will protect it, only thing that did was did add some condition to it.
customer_reviews.author: Acadaz

customer_reviews.title: Restored my leather steering wheel and seats' shine
customer_reviews.text: Has a weird chemical leather smell but that fades away. I would recommend applying it after the end of a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sath Subb

customer_reviews.title: Came up just a little short
customer_reviews.text: Having used 303 products for many years, this was first try with leather cleaner/conditioner. Must say, I was a bit disappointed with the result. It did clean the leather as advertised, but even after buffing dry, it had a dry look to it and didn't have that slip/slide feel to it. Have been using Mcguires for years, and looks like I'll continue with that product. It really surprised me. However that does not take away anything from the other 303 products I've been using on the marine stuff, and the auto detail spray is absolutely outstanding. Far superior to any others tried.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Campbell II

customer_reviews.title: Great product for user on leather
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, works as advertised. It easily cleans and protects leather products. On clean leather, it will bring back the deep rich color of original like new.
customer_reviews.author: Southerngent

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok
customer_reviews.text: We have light tan leather seats and blue from jeans was getting on them and this took it right off as far as protection is yet to be seen will update
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: 303 Leather Cleaner is a Great Product and not Greasy!
customer_reviews.text: If you love to detail your car or Truck and have leather seats, this is a must for you, You can use on leather furniture as well to preserve it, much cheaper and better than other products to keep that leather seat or furniture great looking and conditioned
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great product and only thing I’ll use on my truck . Not to oily and really makes the leather look great
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: expensive but works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: This is 303 products. GREAT products, little bit expensive. But none the less its a good product
customer_reviews.author: Sgtfluffy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product that Works
customer_reviews.text: Yep. Like it. Works as advertised. Cleans my jacuzzi cover with minimal effort. Use it in conjunction with companion 303 Protectant spray. Keeps the cover protected from bird droppings, bugs, and other critters seem to avoid using it as a bridge. Will use in my car next. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mainster

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: gives your leather a clean, uniform, NON-shiny look. Some products make your leather look wet. This does not. This dries to a matte finish. Not as slippery as others. A little goes a long way. What more could I ask for! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ToddyG.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: 303 sent me my normal 303 product and not the leather cleaner, but I love that stuff so I don't mind. Wouldn't mind trying the leather cleaner/protectant also, lol
customer_reviews.author: Ken Boltz

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: has a pleasant smell, but nothing about the finish is "better" than any other product I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tobey

customer_reviews.title: It’s a 303 product is any more needed to be said.
customer_reviews.text: 303 has always produced great products this is no exception. Easy to use spray wipe no residue feels like new leather protects from uv rays pleasant Tropical scent that does not linger
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerman

customer_reviews.title: A good product. Does't have too much of a leather ...
customer_reviews.text: A good product. Does't have too much of a leather smell. However it leaves this sticky/frictionless feeling to the seat for a couple days. I think the surface texture comes from me applying it in cold weather. I heat up the spray under warm water before applying, works good.
customer_reviews.author: Sher22

customer_reviews.title: Fast with no residue
customer_reviews.text: I use my 303 Leather on my leather car seats and the leather throughout the house. Protects the leather and doesn't leave any residue.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Ashmun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't use too much, can cause leather to become too soft!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Protectant
customer_reviews.text: This seems much better that the Armor-All I had been using - but it is pricey. I don't like the tires on my Jeep to be shiny - this buts a nice sheen on the tires and on the weather stripping. I would recommend it over its competitors. It seems to hold up longer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Use 303 on my tonto cover for years and is great. Now I have leatherette car interior and will go with 303
customer_reviews.author: classic trucj

customer_reviews.title: Leaked out
customer_reviews.text: I received this bottle but is had gone , it leaked out during shipping
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: I believe it works!
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a baseball mit that was 50 years old. It was dried out and looks like the softness and pliablity returned.

customer_reviews.title: Poor product for a 303
customer_reviews.text: Not very good. Mcguires is way better and lasts longer. This product has a smell but does not do much.
customer_reviews.author: Tiki1u812

customer_reviews.title: Not yet used
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet. A friend of mine told me about it. She said it’s one of the best on the market right now. So I hope this manufacture is able to keep up the good job
customer_reviews.author: BJames

customer_reviews.title: Leaked and lost 1/2 of content
customer_reviews.text: The bottle and sprayer come separately and they did not fit well together. The bottle tipped over and I lost about half before noticing it was leaking. Otherwise, the product did a very good job
customer_reviews.author: terjam

customer_reviews.title: Really Protects
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for cleaning & protecting my hot tub cover. I also use it on my car's leather interior.
customer_reviews.author: My take...

customer_reviews.title: 303 leather cleaner and conditioner suggests using it every 30-45 days
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaner and conditioner for our leather furniture and car seats. It was recommended to us by a company that does repair work on leather and vinyl items.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It appears to work fine. The reason I buy is because the industry recommends 303 as best products. I use it on my truck and boats

customer_reviews.title: Info
customer_reviews.text: Works well, if used according to directions the heat from the sun has not had a negative effect on it.

customer_reviews.title: Love it on my black leather

customer_reviews.text: These 303 Products seem to be superior to the options bought at box retailers. I have used two of their products so far and I am very pleased with the performance.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product. Just doesn’t leave that nice shine on the leather. I have been using it on all my leather.

customer_reviews.title: Supple again

customer_reviews.title: Keeps condition NEW with great easement

customer_reviews.title: Great Leather Cleaner and Conditioner ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product..! I used on a Leather couch. Wanted to clean and soften the leather. Worked as I had hoped.. Great!

customer_reviews.title: I gave it a try
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this to do well, especially after all the great reviews. This product is not horrible by any means but for the same price you can get way better product that performs better. I’m going back to what I have been using for the last 3yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: NO SHINE
customer_reviews.text: 3 in 1s should always have a shine but jokes on me. Chemical guys has mastered the perfect circular stream.

customer_reviews.title: Just O.K. product
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this is about comparable to most other quality interior sprays. Nothing really exceptional or outstanding @ results. The coconut scent dissipates very quickly.

customer_reviews.title: 100 % as described.
customer_reviews.text: Yes it arrives on times and I love it. Thanks for making such a great product.

customer_reviews.title: easy to work with and quality sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I purchase frequently to do my leather recliner and leather interior on my truck and suv seems to work well, not greasy little if any scent, easy to work with and quality sprayer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful and cleans the leather well. Doesn’t leave a weird film and hasn’t caused any fading or weird coloring to my seats yet.

customer_reviews.text: 303 products are great. I use the leather cleaner once every 2 months and my interior still looks new after 3 years.

customer_reviews.title: works good

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Used it when trying to sell my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Used it when trying to sell my 2011 car which had leather seats and was rarely cleaned or detailed. All the buyers were very impressed by the condition of the seats and the interior. Sold the car for a good price. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Did not clean spots and or  stains on leather seats.
customer_reviews.text: I own many 303 products and they all work great except for this product. I have 5 various spots on my leather seats and this did not clean them at all.

product_meta.title: 303 (30218) Leather 3 - In - 1 Complete Care - Cleans, Conditions, And Protects, Helps Prevent Fading And Cracking - Rinse Free Formula - Repels Dust, Lint, And Staining, 16 fl. oz.
product_meta.description: Size:16 fl. oz.303 Leather 3-in-1 Complete Care cleans, conditions and provides UV protection to all finished leather and vinyl. It will help clean up surface dirt and grime, as will help repel future dust, lint and stains. It also contains superior UV protection to prevent fading and cracking of the leather caused by the sun’s harmful UV rays. Easy to use formula, just spray on and wipe off.
feature_bullets: 303 Automotive 3 in 1 Leather Complete Care is made in the U. S. A. and safely cleans, conditions and restores finished leather & vinyl to keep it looking new, longer.

Safe for any finished leather or vinyl surface such as finished leather seats, furniture upholstery, saddlery, footwear, coats, furniture, handbags, purses & briefcases, sports equipment and luggage. Not for use on suede or unfinished leather.
Contains superior UV protection to help prevent fading and cracking and keeps leather hydrated and moisturized. Rinse-free formula leaves a non-greasy feel, no odor and is non toxic.
Long lasting and maintains clean surfaces, this product will repel future dust, lint and stains. One treatment lasts up to 45 days.
303 Leather and Vinyl Cleaner is an easy to use spray on formula that comes in a 16 fl. oz. bottle with trigger sprayer. Made in the U. S. A.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars645 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
